<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_fru_cir.CIRAjaxUtils</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>CIRAjaxUtils</name><script><![CDATA[var CIRAjaxUtils = Class.create();
CIRAjaxUtils.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getLocationData: function() {
		var locationData = {};
		locationData.name = this.getParameter('sysparm_location');
		var obj = new CIRUtils().GetLocationFilterData(locationData);
		return JSON.stringify(obj);
		/*
		var addressValues = {};
		//addressValues.country = "Japan";
		
		var grLocation = new GlideRecord(tables.LOCATION);
		//grLocation.addEncodedQuery('active=true^type=1^sys_id='+locationData.name);
		grLocation.addEncodedQuery('sys_id='+locationData.name);
		grLocation.query();

		if (grLocation.next()) {
			addressValues.country = grLocation.getValue('country');
			//addressValues.state = getAdressValueId('state',grLocation.getValue('state'));
			//addressValues.city = getAdressValueId('city',grLocation.getValue('city'));
			//addressValues.state = grLocation.getValue('state');
			//addressValues.city = grLocation.getValue('city');
		}
		
		return JSON.stringify(addressValues);*/

		
	},

	type: 'CIRAjaxUtils'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-02-23 10:02:08</sys_created_on><sys_id>75bdd3f81ba66410d4bca977b04bcb3a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>11</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CIRAjaxUtils</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Corporate Incident Response" source="x_fru_cir">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="Corporate Incident Response">265c101f13ab44100b8670a76144b0a2</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_75bdd3f81ba66410d4bca977b04bcb3a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>lopez-aznar@dxc.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-02-23 22:33:20</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
